name: Crazy Bikers 3: Bike riding
description:
The craziest bike race around the world is back! Crazy Bikers 3, the best bicycle racing game ever is here!

Cool and crazy bicycles with turbo boost, extreme jumps and stunts, full rider and bike evolutions - all in Crazy Bikers 3!

Millions of people played and love the Crazy Bikers series. Spawn Studios proudly presents Crazy Bikers 3, the best game ever in the series. With dozens of hot new features, new game mechanics, great gameplay and out-of-this-world graphics! And, the best of all, it's completely free - grab your bike and start pedalling!

Some new features:

- Beautiful high definition art and incredibly rich scenery!
- Original music and rich, high quality environmental sound effects.
- Full suspension bikes, fine-tuned for realistic gameplay.
- New game mechanics featuring multiple tracks in the same race.
- Addicting and extremely smooth gameplay with two control schemes.
- New cool and crazy riders with their amazing bikes.
- Completely transform and evolve each bike, rider and boost!
- Boost button activates your bike mounted rocket to speed up!

Lots of stuff coming up next, be sure to leave us a nice review if you like the game!

* Free game with optional in app purchases.

Start pedaling around the world!
